1.content:
For Emma Swan, life is anything but a happy ending. She never knew her Parents and she was adopted when she was a baby . As a Bail Bonds Collector She didn't always get the greatest people in life around her as well . On the night of her 28th Birthday Emma Got a visit from her Son Henry Who she gave up for adoption 10 years earlier.
Everything changes. The now 10-year-old Henry is in desperate need of Emma's help because he believes from reading a book of fairytales that she's the daughter of Snow White and Prince Charming - who sent her away from the Enchanted Forest to be protected from a curse that was enacted by the Evil Queen. Emma initially refuses to believe a word of Henry's story but soon finds that his hometown of Storybrooke, Maine is more than it seems. Because it's in Storybrooke that all of the classic characters we know are frozen in time with no memories of their former selves - except for the Evil Queen, who is Storybrooke's mayor and Henry's adoptive mother Regina Mills.Shortly After arriving in town Emma Meets the Mayor and Sheriff , who hires her as his deputy/private eye .Emma will have to accept her destiny and uncover the mystery behind a place where Every Fairytale Creature Exsists .
Along with the Evil Queen , There are others who remember the Enchanted Forest and want to make the best of this new situation.
1.title: Happy Birthday Emma Swan

15.content: The Characters are so Many and have many ideas . One of which is ...........
15.title: Other

info.brief_description: This is a Story Based in the World of the ABC Show Once Upon a Time ,the darkerside.
info.description:
This is a Story Set in the Fictional Town of StoryBrooke , which is the setting for the ABC Show Once Upon a Time . There is always more then one way to tell a story and there is always more then one idea of how it should go . This Story is Open to anyone who watches the show or hasn't , and want to explore the world of Fairytale Characters in our world . A brief Set up for the Story is the Evil Queen Regina Cast a Curse on the Fairy tale world to end Snow White and Prince Charmings Happy Ending . Rumpelstiltskin
wrote the curse with one weakness Emma Swan Snow White and Prince Charmings Daughter who was a new born sent ahead to our world unaffected by the curse . When she Turns 30 , is when she is supposed to break the curse , all the Fairy tale Characters have been transported into the town of StoryBrooke Maine and have no memories of there former lifes. Brief intro but you can expand and use Characters from other stories as well just ground them in our reality . Please have fun with the Story and Keep the spelling errors down . Other then that have fun with it Body Swapping , Possession , Changing and anything else is welcome.
